channel.title: Choice : A Server With Races Or Normal GamePlay (Info inside!)
channel.description:
Do you prefer a server which are races in ...
Races: - Every race can wear a certain weapons / armor - They will have different shops if melee and mage trade same shops there will popup a weapon shop with melee weapons for melee and a shop with staffs / runes for mage - Melee : Can train Attack , Prayer, Strength , Defence and Hitpoints - Mage : Can train Magic , Prayer, Defence and Hitpoints - Range : Can train Ranged , Prayer, Strength and Hitpoints
The combat level will be calculated so its bassicly a bit the same for all :-)
• Melee • Range • Mage
Normal: - Anybody can wear ALL weapons / armor - Can train all skills
I got the races coded already , but I don't know if I would use them. Post ideas !

item.title: Choice : A Server With Races Or Normal GamePlay (Info inside!)
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

LeScape:

I’ve had it for a while too but I’ve discarded it…these are RS2 private servers. A majority of players are people who suck ass at real RuneScape and want somewhere were success comes with less, little, or no work. I’m pretty sure the majority of players (almost none of them view this thread), would prefer a realistic RS2 server, not a WoW spin-off.

I agree, but…

I also believe that Java Maybe’s server(with races) can be a new route for private servers.

Lots of people play Dodian, and it’s not some ::master ::cash server.

People need to start learning that games are boring without challenges, or they need to stop playing them at all.

Also, with those cheapy ass command servers, people get bored within a day or two. It’s fun to just hang around, but it gets lame without any point to the game.

Races ATW.

Once again, good luck.

PM me when the Beta is running =D

Read full topic
item.source: Choice : A Server With Races Or Normal GamePlay (Info inside!)
